attributes.action: Withdraw the Northern Ireland Sexual Orientation Regulations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These regulations could severely limit free speech and must be dropped.
Homosexual harassment laws could be used to intimidate Christians and to attempt to prevent them from sharing their faith.
Genuine cases of harassment can be dealt with under existing legislation.
I believe the proposed legislation to be contrary to Article 9 of the European Convention on Human Rights

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
